steps.text: Talk to Witch Varika at the Altar of Rites.

Collect the seeds of Anger, Horror and Lunacy: RIGHT after talking to Witch Varika at the Altar of Rites talk to Witch Arkenia at the Altar of Rites, she'll give you the task for the third stage of the quest. Talk to Annika near the School of Dark Arts.

Go to the School of Dark Arts, hunt Skeleton Hunter, Skeleton Hunter Archer and other sceletons, collect Knee Bone  — 2 pcs. Talk to Annika near the School of Dark Arts. Talk to Charkeren at the Black Rock Hill. Go to the Swampland, hunt Zombie Forest Elf, collect Family's Remains  — 3 pcs. Talk to Charkeren at the Black Rock Hill. Go to the Ruins of Agony, hunt Skeleton Scout, collect Heart of Lunacy  — 3 pcs.
Talk to Witch Arkenia at the Altar of Rites.
Talk to Witch Varika at the Altar of Rites and get the reward.
When you get level 20, talk to High Priest in Dark Elf Guild in the Town of Gludio or Gludin Village to transfer your class.
